code: import React from"react";import{useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{CartContext}from"../../context/cart.context";import Button from"../button/button.component";import CartItem from"../cart-item/cart-item.component";import"./cart-dropdown.style.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartDropdown=()=>{const{cartItems}=useContext(CartContext);const navigates=useNavigate();const goToCheckoutHandler=()=>{navigates("/Checkout");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-dropdown-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-items",children:cartItems.length?cartItems.map(cartItem=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{cartItem:cartItem},cartItem.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"empty-message",children:" Your cart empty"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:goToCheckoutHandler,children:"GO TO CHECKOUT"})]});};export default CartDropdown;
